content: My short labels are not showing up in the IG on neither the Detailed Descriptions page nor the differential table. I checked the column name, "Short Label". Is there a flag or parameter that needs to be set to indicate that they should be used?

I see a parameter apply-context. Should I be using that?
I don't think it's any settings in your publication. I don't think the publication tooling is set up to do it period.
Bummer. I think will concatenate the short labels in bold with their definitions.
short labels have never appeared in the detailed description tab
I thought they were appearing on the differential
Build pq-cmc - most of the differential elements have short descriptions
I didn't see one short description in any of the whole set of profiles
but... we'll see. I've made some changes
